formalText: He feels like he is floundering in his everyday life.
He also expressed that he felt anxious while talking.

But right now he's very frustrated with this idea of trying to make a relationship better when he's back and Tanya is out of the crisis where she was hospitalized, but she's still pretty bad, like she's not doing well.
So yesterday she sort of said in a slightly peculiar way,
goodbye James, which she never really says his name, so he was concerned for a portion of the day that she was going to kill herself.
He actually doesn't want to hurt her.
His desire is to not be unhappy forever or not be unhappy.
